name: rosie
text: I think that perhaps the scariest aspect of Carrot Top is that he has a smooth, womanly face from all the plastic surgery he's had...then his weird shiny face with his crazy fluffy hair is perched incongruously atop a ripped body. It's hella weird.

name: closefriend
text: One little joy buzzer fires off and Pat's back in the dick game.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Vegetable Brain just shot the dove of Pat's niceness with his horrible joke.

name: epicurus
text:
The clincher in this one is the fact that Pat thanks Carrot Top twice for one of the good lucks, thus averaging his thank you/good luck ratio at 1.3:1.

The real Pat would only ever thank someone sarcastically and probably tell them to use some dried-bee best-itutes.

name: darthemed
text: That must have been a dangerously high-amplitude joy buzzer.

name: captain_arlo
text: I know!  I was always so disappointed with joy buzzers when I was a kid.  I wanted them to actually shock people like in cartoons.  More like mild-bemusement buzzer.

text:

name: bixschmix
text:
OK. So the alt-text here refers to a movie called "The Point," narrated by Ringo Starr. It's about a boy, Oblio, and his dog, Arrow. (A round-headed boy who's born in a land of pointy-headed people and sharp angles. The moral is that "you don't have to have a point to have a point," which he learns only after he's outlawed to the "Forest of No Point."

Did I mention it's a musical?

If you have a chance to see this movie, do it. If you have a chance to see it in an altered state, all the better. (Just sayin'. Smoke some heated up marijuana or, if you're not afraid of hallucinogenics...well google it.)

name: mattylite
text: w/ music by Harry Nilsson too.  The guy with one to many S's in his name.

name: catjumpjohn
text: I love Harry Nilsson and I love Achewood.  The alt text of this made me extremely happy.

name: baryonyx
text:
I have seen. And I laughed. The finest passage is from the song about all the places an bubble of air travels:

"And that whaaaaale...he got so ooold...he decompoooosed...and then the parts of him sank to the bottom of the sea and into some magmaaaa...AND THEN HE DIIIIED."

name: bluetshirt
text:
my mom still sings that sporadically to this day.

you can download the flick from http://fortheloveofharry.blogspot.com/ .

name: catjumpjohn
text: I like at the end of the album, where Nilsson just says matter-of-factly, "Well, that's it.  That's the end of the story, and the end of the album.  So...thank you." (puts on Bela Legosi voice) "And...GOOD NIGHT!"

name: kovatch
text: I love Pat's Electrocution Face, Priceless

name: biznart
text: Even better is his angry asshole eyebrows that are back in full effect in the next panel.  He doesn't even have to utter a word to let everyone know Pat is back to normal.  And by normal, I mean he is a dick.

name: biznart
text: Ah shit.  It had been a while since I read this arc.  I forgot it took two more zaps from Andretti to turn Pat back into a dick.  Lame away.
